## Problem 1

### Data import

```{r}
read_study = function(flnm) {
  read_csv(flnm) %>%
    mutate(filename = flnm)
}

study_data = 
  list.files(path = "./data",
             pattern = "*.csv",
             full.names = TRUE) %>%
  map_df(~ read_study(.))
```
